description: Their lightweight, backcountry-ready SnowDrifter Jacket combines stretchy fabric for uphill performance with serious storm protection to keep you dry and comfortable in all conditions. The SnowDrifter provides 3-layer H2No® Performance Standard protection in a 70% recycled stretch fabric that’s ideal for human- powered powder pursuits.
name: Patagonia SnowDrifter Jacket - Mens

specs.value: two handwarmers, one chest with secure media pocket with cable routing and internal access, one bicep pocket for pass and one interior drop-in
